titles.title: VA Community Care Wait Time Transparency Act of 2020
VA Community Care Wait Time Transparency Act of 2020
VA Community Care Wait Time Transparency Act of 2020

To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish goals for the timely delivery of medical care and appointments, to make publicly available certain information regarding wait times under the community care program of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
